lead_paragraph: Advertising and intrusive marketing is invading once-sacred spaces like public parks and churches. How to resist the tide of commercialization.

headline.print_headline: Mother Nature Is Brought to You By ...
headline.main: Mother Nature Is Brought to You By ...

snippet: Advertising and intrusive marketing is invading once-sacred spaces like public parks and churches. How to resist the tide of commercialization....
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Tim Wu observes National Park Service and several states, including Idaho and Washington, are planning to sell advertising space within parks; suggests this is but beginning of trend decades in making, and that spaces once thought inviolate will increasingly become part of corporate branding; calls on those who oppose trend to stand up against business model that would saturate every available space, both indoors and outdoors, with commercial advertising.
